title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions and spices, add tomato puree.
Add chicken to the sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy breakfast with mashed avocado on toasted bread.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce served with rice or noodles.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Sprinkle flour and stir to thicken.
Add sour cream and simmer gently for 5 minutes.
Serve over cooked rice or noodles.
